None.Name: The Reaping
None.Description: Activate to sacrifice an own unit in order to gain the victim's lifepoints as extra strength. A total of 1000 lifepoints can be stored at once. As long as the lifepoints last unit deals 100% more damage and takes 100% less damage (stored lifepoints decrease equal to damage that would have been taken). Reusable every 20 seconds.
